text: Masanagudi Mannadiyar Speaking is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by J Francis, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Rajan P Dev in the lead role. ==Cast== * Ansil * Sereena * Kalabhavan Jinto * Vinu Chakravarthy * Jithulal * Kannan * Jagathy Sreekumar * Rajan P Dev * Augustine * Bindu Varappuzha * Idavela Babu * Indrans * Thesni Khan * Baby Asmi ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam- language films
title: Masanagudi Mannadiyar Speaking
